        public static java.util.Optional<io.vertx.core.net.JksOptions> getJksTrustStoreOptions(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> props)
        Returns a JksOptions object using the truststore following SSL configurations:
        • Required:
        • Optional:
        Parameters:
        props - A Map with the truststore location and password configs.
        Returns:
        The JksOptions configured with the above SSL settings. Optional.empty() if the truststore location is null or empty.

      • buildJksKeyStoreOptions

                                                                                       java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> alias)
        Returns a JksOptions object using the keystore SSL configurations:
        • Required:
        • Optional:
        • Optional:

        If an alias is used, then it builds the JksOptions with the internal private key referenced with the alias. The internal private key will be decrypted using the .

        Parameters:
        props - A Map with the keystore location and password configs.
        Returns:
        The JksOptions configured with the above SSL settings. Optional.empty() if the truststore location is null or empty.
